home.description: Hi, I'm Rohitha, a software engineer who loves to create amazing things using code. Besides coding, I'm a curious explorer who loves to learn about different cultures and languages.

about.title: About Me
about.description2: I have a passion for full-stack development and am constantly looking for ways to incorporate it into my engineering work.
about.description3: In addition to coding, I'm a curious explorer who enjoys learning about other cultures and languages.
about.description4: When I'm not at my desk, you might find me traveling, shopping, or partying with friends :)
about.connectDescription: Have a question or want to work with me? Feel free to
about.workDescription2: Leveraging my passion for cutting-edge technology, I began my career as a freelancer, gaining valuable experience and honing my skills.
about.workDescription3: I then transitioned to Kapruka, one of Sri Lanka's largest e-commerce platforms, where I served as a full-stack developer. I played a key role in building their new cargo-based platform, honing my skills in full-stack development, API development, and project management.
about.workDescription4: Subsequently, I joined Dbeeta, an Italian startup, as a full-stack engineer. There, I tackled diverse projects across ERP, CRM, and LMS systems, significantly deepening my full stack development skills and gaining expertise in multiple tech stacks.
about.eduDescription: I graduated from Horizon Campus with a Bachelor of Information Technology (Hons) in Networking and Mobile Computing.

project.title: Projects
project.tag: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.
project.connect: Need more project details, or interested in working together? Reach out to me directly at

links.description: Software engineer who loves building cool things with code. I also enjoy reading the latest tech news and learning new things.
